name: Labyrinth of Darkness
description:
Your land has been invaded by monsters of darkness, you need to take the lantern and find the cave with Nippa's soul and resurrect her, as she is the holder of light, able to save your land. Enjoy this beat 'em up with a maze made with RPG Maker VX Ace.

It's still a "short" game, but depending on the range I can improve it and make it bigger and with more things to do.
